titles.title: To require agencies to ensure that menstrual hygiene products are stocked in, and available free of charge in, restrooms in public buildings, and for other purposes.
Menstrual Hygiene Products in Federal Buildings Act
Menstrual Hygiene Products in Federal Buildings Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.
